Class OsgiConfiguration

extends Object
    OSGi configuration wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • toMap

        public Map<String,String> toMap(String propertyName)
        Returns the property as a map with string keys and string values.

        The property is considered as a collection whose entries are of the form key=value.

        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        Returns:
        property map

      • toMap

        public Map<String,String> toMap(String propertyName,
                                List<String> defaultValue)
        Returns the property as a map with string keys and string values.

        The property is considered as a collection whose entries are of the form key=value.

        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        defaultValue - default value to convert to map return if property value is null
        Returns:
        property map

        defaultValue - default value to return if property value is null

        double value

      • getAsBoolean

        public boolean getAsBoolean(String propertyName,
                            boolean defaultValue)
        Returns the boolean value of the property or the defaultValue if the property is null. If the property is not a Boolean it is converted by calling Boolean.valueOf on the string value of the object.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        defaultValue - default value to return if property value is null
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • getAsInteger

        public int getAsInteger(String propertyName,
                        int defaultValue)
        Returns the property as an integer or the defaultValue if the property is null or if the property is not an Integer and cannot be converted to an Integer from the property's string value.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        defaultValue - default value to return if property value is null
        Returns:
        integer value

      • getAsString

        public String getAsString(String propertyName,
                          String defaultValue)
        Returns the property as a string or the defaultValue if the property is null.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        defaultValue - default value to return if property value is null
        Returns:
        string value

      • getAsList

        public List<String> getAsList(String propertyName)
        Returns the property as an array of Strings. If the property is a scalar value its string value is returned as a single element array. If the property is an array, the elements are converted to String objects and returned as an array. If the property is a collection, the collection elements are converted to String objects and returned as an array. Otherwise (if the property is null) null is returned.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        Returns:
        list of values

      • getAsList

        public List<String> getAsList(String propertyName,
                              List<String> defaultValue)
        Returns the property as an array of Strings. If the property is a scalar value its string value is returned as a single element array. If the property is an array, the elements are converted to String objects and returned as an array. If the property is a collection, the collection elements are converted to String objects and returned as an array. Otherwise (if the property is null) the default value is returned.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - configuration property name
        defaultValue - default value to return if property is null
        Returns:
        list of values
